stimulusHtml: An electron beam is projected at a crystal, as shown in the diagram. The signal on the other side of the crystal is recorded on a screen. A student claims this is evidence that the electrons can exhibit wave properties. Which of the following statements justifies the claim?
choicesHtml: A signal from the electrons passes through the crystal.
The pattern of signal intensity on the screen has bright and dark areas.
The pattern of the signal intensity on the screen is similar to the interference pattern of electromagnetic radiation passing through narrow slits.
The spread of the pattern of the signal intensity on the screen is different for crystals of different interatomic spacing.
